Package org.jgrapes.io.util

Class ManagedBuffer.CharBufferView

java.lang.Object
org.jgrapes.io.util.ManagedBuffer.CharBufferView
Enclosing class:
ManagedBuffer<T extends Buffer>
public class ManagedBuffer.CharBufferView extends Object
A read-only view of the managed buffer’s content (backing buffer) and a reference to the managed buffer.

Can be used if several consumers need the same content.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    CharBuffer
    get()
    Returns the ByteBuffer that represents this view (position, mark, limit).
    ManagedBuffer<CharBuffer>
    managedBuffer()
    Returns the managed buffer that this reader is a view of.
